3.name: Narration
3.text:
A rough and beastly large man, who looks like he
could be a boss, is gnawing on the flesh of some
beast while drinking. His men, likely his
subordinates, are rummaging through the remains of
their loot, probably searching for anything
valuable.

4.name: Thief A
4.text:
"Boss, today's haul seems pretty good, doesn't
it?"

5.name: Zoku B
5.text:
"Hehe, with this, it looks like we won't have to
worry about alcohol for a while."

6.name: Thief Boss
6.text:
"......By the way, have those chasing after the
thieves returned yet?"

7.name: Zoku C
7.text:
"They're a bit slow... If it's just those kind of
women, they should have caught them quickly and
come back."

8.name: Thief Boss
8.text:
"Tch, if they lay a finger on me, I'll punch them
out!"

11.name: Eni-sensei
11.text:
(There are four of them left. It seems like this
is all of them. What should we do? Sol)

12.name: Sol
12.text: (...Here I go! I'll do my best to take them down!)

19.name: Narration
19.text:
The leader of the thieves was defeated, the others
who surrendered were captured, and those who
resisted until the end were abandoned. Considering
the atrocities they committed against innocent
people, this was already a fairly lenient
treatment.
